name: Terra monster. horror game
description:
Use W A S and D to move Forward, Left, Right, and Back. Space to use flashlight.

Sound and image credits: sounds from slenderman and flashlight texture from bendy and the ink machine and static texture from google

All the code by me/tnt games

Story:

You and your summer camp went to a island one morning you woke up and your camp mates vanished and the terra monster is on the loose! get 8 gears to fix the boat and escape!!!
